section.p: The Ghostwaters of Nyg are a place of ill repute. Mist lies in a heavy blanket across the sea and sends white tendrils writhing against the sides of the ship. To the north-east is imperial Chambara, capital city of the exotic land of Akatsurai.
‘My brother went there,’ the ship’s surgeon tells you.
‘I don’t know. The poor devil never returned.’
